      • generatePassword

        public static java.lang.String generatePassword(GeneratorSetting setting)
        Generates a password using the specified GeneratorSetting.
        Parameters:
        setting - the GeneratorSetting used to generate a password.
        Returns:
        the password as a String.

      • generatePassword

        public static java.lang.String generatePassword(boolean USE_ULETTERS,
                                                boolean USE_LLETTERS,
                                                boolean USE_DIGITS,
                                                boolean USE_SPECIAL,
                                                java.lang.String OWN_CHARS,
                                                int LENGTH)
        Generates a random password using the specified settings.
        Parameters:
        USE_ULETTERS - boolean which sets the use of uppercase letters.
        USE_LLETTERS - boolean which sets the use of lowercase letters.
        USE_DIGITS - boolean which sets the use of digit letters.
        USE_SPECIAL - boolean which sets the use of special characters.
        OWN_CHARS - String where own characters can be put for password generation.
        LENGTH - length of the generated password.
        Returns:
        the generated password as a String.

      • generatePassword

        public static java.lang.String generatePassword(boolean USE_ULETTERS,
                                                boolean USE_LLETTERS,
                                                boolean USE_DIGITS,
                                                boolean USE_SPECIAL,
                                                int LENGTH)
        Generates a random password using the specified settings.
        Parameters:
        USE_ULETTERS - boolean which sets the use of uppercase letters.
        USE_LLETTERS - boolean which sets the use of lowercase letters.
        USE_DIGITS - boolean which sets the use of digit letters.
        USE_SPECIAL - boolean which sets the use of special characters.
        LENGTH - length of the generated password.
        Returns:
        the generated password as a String.

      • calculateCrackTime

        public static java.math.BigDecimal calculateCrackTime(java.lang.String password,
                                                      int numGuesses)
        Calculates how many seconds it would take for a bruteforce-attack guess the correct password given a number of guesses per second.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to crack.
        numGuesses - the number of guesses per second the bruteforce-attack has.
        Returns:
        the number of seconds as a BigDecimal.

        Returns:
        a printable estimation.
